net.bytebuddy

Class ClassFormatVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.ClassFormatVersion

  • public class ClassFormatVersion
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper object for representing a validated class format version as specified by the JVMS.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ClassFormatVersion JAVA_V1
      The byte code version of Java 1.
      static ClassFormatVersion JAVA_V2
      The byte code version of Java 2.

      The byte code version of Java 3.

      The byte code version of Java 4.
      static ClassFormatVersion JAVA_V5
      The byte code version of Java 5.
      static ClassFormatVersion JAVA_V6
      The byte code version of Java 6.
      static ClassFormatVersion JAVA_V7
      The byte code version of Java 7.
      static ClassFormatVersion JAVA_V8
      The byte code version of Java 8.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassFormatVersion(int versionNumber)
      Creates a wrapper for a given minor-major release of the Java class file format and validates the integrity of the version number.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      static ClassFormatVersion forCurrentJavaVersion()
      Finds the highest class format version compatible to the current JVM version by parsing the java.version property provided by System.getProperty(String).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassFormatVersion

        public ClassFormatVersion(int versionNumber)
        Creates a wrapper for a given minor-major release of the Java class file format and validates the integrity of the version number.
        Parameters:
        versionNumber - The minor-major release number.

    • Method Detail

      • forKnownJavaVersion

        public static ClassFormatVersion forKnownJavaVersion(int javaVersion)
        Creates a ClassFormatVersion for a given major release of Java. Currently, all versions reaching from Java 1 to Java 8 are supported.
        Parameters:
        javaVersion - The Java version.
        Returns:
        A wrapper for the given Java version.

      • forCurrentJavaVersion

        public static ClassFormatVersion forCurrentJavaVersion()
        Finds the highest class format version compatible to the current JVM version by parsing the java.version property provided by System.getProperty(String).
        Returns:
        The currently running Java process's byte code format version.

      • getVersionNumber

        public int getVersionNumber()
        Returns the minor-major release number of this class format version.
        Returns:
        The minor-major release number of this class format version.
